member.name: T:SadConsole.Entities.Manager
member.summary: Manages a set of entities. Adds a render step and only renders the entities that are in the parent visible area.

member.summary: An event to indicate that an entity entered a zone.

member.name: E:SadConsole.Entities.Manager.ExitZone
member.summary: An event to indicate that an entity exited a zone.

member.summary: The zones associated with this manager.

member.summary: Creates a new manager to handle entity movement within zones.

member.summary: Adds a zone to this manager.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Entities.Manager.Remove(SadConsole.Entities.Zone)
member.summary: Removes a zone from this manager.
member.param: The hotspot to remove.

member.summary: Called when an entity enters a zone.

The new position the entity left.
